alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 12:23AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marin, southeastern Sonoma, western San Francisco and south central Napa Counties through 1245 AM PST... At 1222 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Point Reyes Station to 30 miles southwest of Stinson Beach. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Napa, Petaluma, San Rafael, Novato, Mill Valley, San Anselmo, Larkspur, Sonoma, Corte Madera, Fairfax, San Geronimo, Black Point-Green Point, Point Reyes Station, Stinson Beach, Tomales, Kentfield, Lucas Valley-Marinwood, Muir Beach, Dillon Beach and Boyes Hot Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco
